title: Prysm takes up more and more memory until it stops. Why?
body:
### Describe the bug

Prysm takes up more and more memory until it stops. Why?

This is my startup command
./prysm.sh beacon-chain --slasher --execution-endpoint=http://127.0.0.1:8551 --jwt-secret=/root/prysm/jwt.hex --chain-id=1 --datadir ='/home/www/eth_data' --mainnet --checkpoint-sync-url=https://sync.invis.tools --genesis-beacon-api-url=https://sync.invis.tools -- enable-experimental-state --p2p-max-peers=20 --grpc-max-msg-size=1000000000

geth version geth version 1.13.2-stable-dc34fe82

Latest Prysm version is v4.1.1.

Run using screen
